resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81583</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81583</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Music and Feeling II -- Instrumental Composition</string>
            <string language="es">Música y sentimientos I – Composición instrumental</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol agus Mothúcháin II – Cumadóireacht Ionstraime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik und Gefühl II -- instrumenteller Aufbau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique et sentiment II -- composition 
instrumentale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música e sentimento II -- composição 
instrumental</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica e sensibilità II -- composizione 
strumentale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική και αίσθημα ΙΙ -- οργανική σύνθεση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Focuses on musical compositon involving the use of instruments. Children are also required to listen to recorded music.</string>
            <string language="es">Se centra en la composición musical con el uso de instrumentos. También se les pide a los niños que escuchen música grabada.</string>
            <string language="ga">Díríonn sé ar chumadóireacht ceoil ina n-úsáidtear ionstraimí. Caithfidh na leanaí éisteacht le ceol taifeadta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Foki auf dem musikalischen compositon, das den 
Gebrauch der Instrumente mit einbezieht. Kinder werden auch 
benoetigt, gespeicherte Musik zu hören.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Foyers sur le compositon musical comportant 
l'utilisation des instruments. Des enfants sont également 
requis d'écouter la musique enregistrée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Focos no compositon musical que envolve o uso dos
instrumentos. As crianças são requeridas também escutar a 
música gravada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuochi su compositon musicale che coinvolge l'uso
degli strumenti. I bambini egualmente sono tenuti ad ascoltare 
musica registrata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εστίαση στο μουσικό compositon που περιλαμβάνει τη 
χρήση των οργάνων. Τα παιδιά πρέπει επίσης για να ακούσουν
την καταγραμμένη μουσική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>

            <entry>5016</entry>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>

        <classification>
